segments.text: My attention now shifts to the children on the left side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A small boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, almost ready to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching up, one hand reaching deep into a cookie jar in an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In his other hand, he holds a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but worry he's going to fall off that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems very dangerous for him to be climbing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could really hurt him, especially with the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him looks on, complicit in the cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's reaching up, ready to receive her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their mission, completely ignoring the potential danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
